## AppApi

The Application API.

### Component

The component to be rendered.

Type: function (): JSX.Element

### render

Renderes the component.

Type: function (container: ([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)): void

#### Parameters

-   `container` **([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)** The container. Optional parameter.

### getLanguage

Gets the language.

Type: function (): [string][56]

### setLanguage

Sets the language.

Type: function (language: [string][56]): void

#### Parameters

-   `language` **[string][56]** The language.

### getTheme

Gets the theme.

Type: function (): [string][56]

### setTheme

Sets the theme.

Type: function (theme: [string][56]): void

#### Parameters

-   `theme` **[string][56]** The theme.

## AppBuilder

Helps to build the Application API.

### build

Builds the Application API.

Returns **[AppApi][57]** The Application API.

### withChildren

Sets the children.

#### Parameters

-   `children` **(function (): JSX.Element | [Array][58]&lt;function (): JSX.Element>)** 

### withLanguage

Sets the language.
Default value: 'en'.

#### Parameters

-   `language` **[string][56]** The language.

### withLanguageSetEventHandler

Sets the language set hander.

#### Parameters

-   `languageSetEvent` **function (language: [string][56]): void** 

### withTheme

Sets the theme.
Default value: 'default'.

#### Parameters

-   `theme` **[string][56]** The theme.

### withThemeSetEventHandler

Sets the theme set event handler.

#### Parameters

-   `themeSetEvent` **function (theme: [string][56]): void** 

## SwitchButtonApi

The Switch Button API.

### Component

The component to be rendered.

Type: function (): JSX.Element

### render

Renderes the component.

Type: function (container: ([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)): void

#### Parameters

-   `container` **([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)** The container. Optional parameter.

### getState

Gets the state of the switch button.

Type: function (): [boolean][59]

### setState

Sets the state of the switch button.

Type: function (state: [boolean][59]): void

### toggleState

Toggles the state of the switch button.

Type: function (): void

## SwitchButtonBuilder

Helps to build the Switch Button API.

### build

Builds the Switch Button API.

Returns **[SwitchButtonApi][60]** The Switch Button API.

### withChildren

Sets the children.

#### Parameters

-   `children` **(function (): JSX.Element | [Array][58]&lt;function (): JSX.Element>)** 

### withEnabled

Sets the state of the Switch Button.
false is 'off' state, true is 'on' state.
Default value: false ('off').

#### Parameters

-   `enabled` **[boolean][59]** The state of the Switch Button.

### withEnabledSetEventHandler

Sets the enabled set event handler.

#### Parameters

-   `enabledSetEvent` **function (enabled: [boolean][59]): void** 

## WidgetApi

The widget API.

### Component

The component to be rendered.

Type: function (): JSX.Element

### render

Renderes the component.

Type: function (container: ([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)): void

#### Parameters

-   `container` **([Element][54] \| [DocumentFragment][55] | null)** The container. Optional parameter.

### getTheme

Gets the theme.

Type: function (): [string][56]

### setTheme

Sets the theme.

Type: function (theme: [string][56]): void

## WidgetBuilder

Helps to build the widget API.

### build

Builds the widget API.

Returns **[WidgetApi][61]** The Widget API.

### withChildren

Sets the children.

#### Parameters

-   `children` **(function (): JSX.Element | [Array][58]&lt;function (): JSX.Element>)** 

### withTheme

Sets the theme.
Default value: 'default'.

#### Parameters

-   `theme` **[string][56]** The theme.

### withThemeSetEventHandler

Sets the theme set event handler.

#### Parameters

-   `themeSetEvent` **function (theme: [string][56]): void** 

### withContainer

Sets the container the widget will be rendered in.

#### Parameters

-   `container` **[string][56]** The container.
